item.title: The estate cleaner has not picked up letter for over a year, 17th February
item.description:
The cleaners have not picked up litter along this stretch of green for a year. It’s full of rubbish including drug paraphernalia food products disgusting chicken parts and food and I’ve seen rat frequently. Hackney please clean this area on a regular basis

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gray's Inn Road, King's Cross, Greater London

item.title: Lamppost light not working, 17th February
item.description:
The lamppost light between 39 and 41 Royal Oak Road hasn't been working since Christmas last year. It's dangerous for people walking outside late night. Also, suspicious people were seen around the neighborhood. This should be urgently fixed for neighborhood safety.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Oak Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
